00106             function                get_item( $id , $Condition = '1 = 1' )
00107             {
00108                   try
00109                   {
00110                         $id = $this->Security->get( $id , 'integer' );
00111                         
00112                         $Items = $this->Database->select( '*' , $this->Table , "id = $id AND $Condition" );
00113                         
00114                         if( count( $Items ) == 1 )
00115                         {
00116                               return( $Items[ 0 ] );
00117                         }
00118                         
00119                         throw( new Exception( "An error occured while getting item".mysql_error() ) );
00120                   }
00121                   catch( Exception $e )
00122                   {
00123                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00124                   }
00125             }
00126             
00138             function                get_next_order_item( $Order , $Condition = '1 = 1' )
00139             {
00140                   try
00141                   {
00142                         $Order = $this->Security->get( $Order , 'string' );
00143                         
00144                         $NextItem = $this->Database->select( 
00145                               '*' ,  $this->Table , 
00146                               "`order` >= $Order AND $Condition ORDER BY `order` ASC LIMIT 0 , 2" 
00147                         );
00148 
00149                         if( isset( $NextItem[ 1 ] ) )
00150                         {
00151                               return( $NextItem[ 1 ] );
00152                         }
00153                         
00154                         return( false );
00155                   }
00156                   catch( Exception $e )
00157                   {
00158                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00159                   }
00160             }

00173             function                get_prev_order_item( $Order , $Condition = '1 = 1' )
00174             {
00175                   try
00176                   {
00177                         $Order = $this->Security->get( $Order , 'string' );
00178                         
00179                         $PrevItem = $this->Database->select( 
00180                               '*' , $this->Table ,
00181                               "`order` <= $Order AND $Condition ORDER BY `order` DESC LIMIT 0 , 2"
00182                         );
00183                         
00184                         if( isset( $PrevItem[ 1 ] ) )
00185                         {
00186                               return( $PrevItem[ 1 ] );
00187                         }

00191                   catch( Exception $e )

00193                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );

00208             function                swap_items( $Item1 , $Item2 , $Condition = '1 = 1' )
00209             {
00210                   try
00211                   {
00212                         $this->Database->update( 
00213                               $this->Table , array( '`order`' ) , 
00214                               get_field( $Item2 , 'order' ) , 
00215                               "id = ".get_field( $Item1 , 'id' )
00216                         );
00217                         
00218                         $this->Database->update( 
00219                               $this->Table , array( '`order`' ) , 
00220                               get_field( $Item1 , 'order' ) , 
00221                               "id = ".get_field( $Item2 , 'id' )
00222                         );
00223                   }
00224                   catch( Exception $e )
00225                   {
00226                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00227                   }

00239             function                shift_next( $id , $Condition = '1 = 1' )
00240             {
00241                   try
00242                   {
00243                         $id = $this->Security->get( $id , 'integer' );
00244                         
00245                         $Item = $this->get_item( $id , $Condition );
00246                         $NextItem = $this->get_next_order_item( $Item[ 'order' ] , $Condition );
00247                         
00248                         if( $NextItem === false )
00249                         {
00250                               return;
00251                         }
00252 
00253                         $this->swap_items( $Item , $NextItem , $Condition );
00254                   }
00255                   catch( Exception $e )
00256                   {
00257                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00258                   }
